channel.title: Music – 문스톤밴드(MoonStoneBand)
channel.description: Recent content in 문스톤밴드(MoonStoneBand) on Music

item.title: 문스톤밴드(MoonStoneBand) - 스윗앤스윙(SweetandSwing)
item.description:
She and I we first met at a bar
Don’t matter we fell for each other
Don’t matter laugh at our puppy love
I sure do love her so fucking much
One night when she held me so so tight
We hurried on and kissed each other
Don’t matter laugh at our puppy love
we’ll love each other like burning flames
When our bodies become one
and bounce hot and heavily
She came over and told me that
We are finally having our moment and told me
Baby what we have is sweet and swing
Heated night kept going on and on
What we had finally had gone cold
Just like any other boring love
What we had was like any other
I’m singing this melody about our heated
now stone-cold love
Like our heated night baby
what we had was sweet and swing
